connectionMade

public void connectionMade(MessageDestination clientDest,
                           MessageSender msgSender)
Description copied from interface: ConnectionListenerInterface
To inform the object implementing this interface about a connection made by a client.

Specified by:
connectionMade in interface ConnectionListenerInterface
Parameters:
clientDest - The client destination who made the connection
msgSender - A new MessageSender entity created by the server who accepted the connection. This msgSender can be used by the connection listener object to communicate with the client who made the connection. In other words, the connection is preserved, encapsulated in msgSender, and passed over to the connection listener to use.

connectionBroke

public void connectionBroke(MessageDestination clientDest)
Description copied from interface: ConnectionListenerInterface
To inform a connection listener that an existing connection is broken by the client

Specified by:
connectionBroke in interface ConnectionListenerInterface
Parameters:
clientDest - The destination of the client with whom the connection was made (same as the one who broke the connection)

shutdown

public void shutdown()
